title: Maruti Suzuki Baleno: The drive and the new tech | Should you buy it? - Times Now
content: Maruti Suzuki Baleno: The drive and the new tech | Should you buy it?  Times Now
description: Starting at â‚¹6.35 Lakh, the new age Maruti Baleno aims to capture a bigger share of the premium hatchback market and also make a statement. Other than moving to a more efficient AGS transmission, Maruti Suzuki has also tried making a statement with new tech and safety features. With questions related to safety, crash test ratings and new-age tech taking centre stage, are the changes enough to answer the critics, online communities and especially its customers?
